title: Ep224 Dog Crimes
description:
This week, the gals sniff out some odd canine capers. Topics include one very bad handler, the world-famous decomposition odor analysis database, and a suspicious trail of hair. Fill your bowl with Winc's Honey Beast Chardonnay, sit, staaay, and tune in for Dog Crimes.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
